text: Relative quantification of cytokine signals was done by the comparative threshold cycle (C T ) method [39] using fGAPDH as the internal reference gene. This serves to normalise for differences in Viruses 2019, 11, 1144 6 of 17 the amount of total nucleic acid added to each reaction and the efficiency of the reverse transcriptase step [21, 37] . The programme IBM SPSS Â® was used for statistical comparisons; a two-tailed Mann-Whitney test was applied at the 95% confidence level on the premise that cytokine levels in the two groups were different.
